title: An upcoming Windows 10 build will allow Cortana to send SMS messages
text:
An upcoming Windows 10 build will allow Cortana to send SMS messages 
Published By: Neowin.net - Today 
Windows 10 build 10565 was released this week to both fast and slow ring users. Although unannounced, it looks like a future build will allo...
